#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
vector<ll> v;ll c;
bool check(ll x)
{
	ll s=v[0],cnt=0;
	for(ll i=1;i<v.size();i++)
    {
		if(v[i]-s>=x)
		{
			s=v[i];
			cnt++;
		}
	}
	if(cnt>=c-1) return true;
	else return false;
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n,i,x,l,lo,hi,mid,ans;
    cin>>n>>c;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>x;
        v.push_back(x);
    }
    sort(v.begin(),v.end());
    l=v.size();
    lo=1;hi=v[l-1]-v[0];ans=0;
    while(lo<=hi)
    {
        mid=(lo+hi)/2;
        if(check(mid))
        {
            ans=mid;
            lo=mid+1;
        }
        else hi=mid-1;
    }
    cout<<ans<<endl;
    return 0;
}
